name: Elementalist
flavor_text: An elemental magic user who uses their mastery over their chosen elements to defeat their enemies.

fields.name: RULE
fields.text: You can summon forth your chosen magic to perform minor tasks and tricks as are reasonable for your element.

fields.name: EG
fields.text: You can summon flames to start a fire or shed light, or use psychic powers to pull a book from the shelves. Your base damage is also based on your element.

fields.name: FLAVOR
fields.text: A burst of elemental energy surrounds you, warding off nearby foes.

fields.name: RULE
fields.text: Attack all creatures within 5ft of you. Dealing base damage to those you hit.

fields.name: FLAVOR
fields.text: Surround yourself or an ally with your element, bolstering their natural abilities.

fields.name: RULE
fields.text: Select yourself or an ally you can see within 30ft of you, add your intellect to the next Mettle or Agility test they make. If you have fortunes favor, you can spend it to double the bonus Enhance provides.

fields.name: RULE
fields.text: Pick one of the following options to enhance yourself

choices.name: Elemental Armor
choices.text: Add your Intellect to your armor and take half damage from your chosen element.

choices.name: Bolt Thrower
choices.text: Increase your base attack range by 30ft

choices.name: Bigger Burst
choices.text: Increase the size of your burst to all creatures within 10ft of you.

fields.text: Increase one of your stats by 1 (max 5)

fields.name: RULE
fields.text: Spend 2 Stamina, you can target two different creatures or the same creature twice with your attack.

fields.name: RULE
fields.text: When you take damage of your elemental type, increase your base damage by 2 dice steps the next time you deal elemental damage.

fields.name: RULE
fields.text: During your last stand you can choose to end it early and die. If you choose to do so, make a final 30ft radius attack. The attack deals 3 times your base damage dice to those who it hits, and half damage to all who you either clash or miss. Using this ability kills you.

fields.name: RULE
fields.text: You can spend your Fortune's Favor when you make a magic attack. If the attack hits, all enemies within 5ft of the target take half as much damage.
